root.name: EZ2ON
root.description: EZ2ON is an online rhythm action game opened in 2008 (Beta test in 2007). The service was maintained by Uplay, and all songs were released through contract with Amuseworld. Due to finance issues and maintenance burdens, EZ2ON closed its service on October 19th, 2009. And after a gap of 3 years, EZ2ON returned with a free beta open on January 22th, 2013. The game was redeveloped and published by Cykan Entertainment.EZ2ON is played with a keyboard as well as an arcade controller, such as beatmania controller manufactured by Konami and other customized USB controllers, giving more options to users. The game consists of 4 keys, 5 keys, 6 keys, and 8 keys, each having its unique server respectively. Different servers are made for different keys in order to differentiate the skilled players from the beginners for balancing the level of difficulty in all game rooms.
